channel.title: Cloud on Arrans github.io

item.title: nextcloud/server
item.description: ☁️ Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data

item.title: awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted
item.description: A list of Free Software network services and web applications which can be hosted on your own servers

item.title: HeyPuter/puter
item.description: 🌐 The Internet OS! Free, Open-Source, and Self-Hostable.

item.title: gotify/server
item.description: A simple server for sending and receiving messages in real-time per WebSocket. (Includes a sleek web-ui)

item.title: cloudreve/cloudreve
item.description: 🌩 Self-hosted file management and sharing system, supports multiple storage providers

item.title: kopia/kopia
item.description: Cross-platform backup tool for Windows, macOS & Linux with fast, incremental backups, client-side end-to-end encryption, compression and data deduplication. CLI and GUI included.

item.title: apache/cloudstack
item.description: Apache CloudStack is an opensource Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) cloud computing platform

item.title: sismics/docs
item.description: Lightweight document management system packed with all the features you can expect from big expensive solutions

item.title: padok-team/yatas
item.description: 🦉🔎 A simple tool to audit your AWS/GCP infrastructure for misconfiguration or potential security issues with plugins integration

item.title: rstemmer/musicdb
item.description: 🎧 A music manager with focus on remote access to your music by having a WebUI and providing an audio stream.

item.title: shieldproject/shield
item.description: A standalone system that can perform backup and restore functions for a wide variety of pluggable data systems
